Package com.qulice.maven

Maven plugin.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractQuliceMojo
    Abstract mojo.
    CheckMojo
    Check the project and find all possible violations.
    CoberturaValidator
    Validates with Cobertura.
    DefaultMavenEnvironment
    Environment, passed from MOJO to validators.
    DuplicateFinderValidator
    Validate with maven-duplicate-finder-plugin.
    EnforcerValidator
    Validate with maven-enforcer-plugin.
    InstrumentMojo
    Prepare classes for code coverage check.
    MojoExecutor
    Executor of plugins.
    PomXpathValidator
    Check pom.xml with XPath validation queries.
    SnapshotsValidator
    Check that the project has not SNAPSHOT dependencies if its own status is stable.
    SvnPropertiesValidator
    Check for required svn properties in all text files.
